list.name: tree closed
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,repo FROM "autogen"."treestatus_stack_exec" WHERE "repo" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'closed' AND $timeFilter

list.name: tree open
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,repo FROM "autogen"."treestatus_stack_exec" WHERE "repo" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'open' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "papertrail" WHERE ("event" = 'task end' AND "host" =~ /^$host_regex/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10) fill(null)

SELECT DERIVATIVE(max("pendingTasks"), 1m) FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /$provisioner/ AND "workerType" =~ /$workerType/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 2) fill(previous)

SELECT last("workers"), max("workers"), last("workers") / max("workers") AS "percent" FROM "six_month"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware' AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "workerType"

SELECT mean("running") AS "active2", mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)

current.text: gecko-t-osx-1010 + gecko-t-osx-1010-beta + gecko-t-osx-1014 + gecko-t-osx-1014-beta + gecko-t-osx-1014-iris + gecko-t-osx-1014-macstadium + gecko-t-osx-1014-power + gecko-t-osx-1014-staging

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
list.name: workerType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /tc_queue/ WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM tc_queue_exec WITH KEY = "provisionerId"
